about

I’m a passionate web designer & developer based in Mexico. My graphic design background along with my curiosity, desire to learn and hard work helped me take a turn in my career and enter the web world. Let’s turn UI into code!

Figma UI Photoshop Illustrator HTML CSS SASS JavaScript handlebars
